summary: A father tries to help his son cope with a rare condition that causes the young boy to age beyond his years.
cast: Amitabh Bachchan|Abhishek Bachchan|Vidya Balan|Paresh Rawal|Arundathi Nag|Saurabh Agarwal|Shikha Arora|Rupali Arte|Jaya Bachchan|Divya Bhatia|Karan Bhiwandiker|Sanjay Chauhan|Nimmit Daiya|Ramakant Dayma|Dhruvin Doshi|Milind Doshi|Gagandeep|Tusshar Jain|Alpa Joshi|Rajiv Kachroo|Saagar Kale|Alekh Kapoor|Kapil Kapoor|Pratik Katare|Rajiv Khanna|Swini Khara|Sunny Krishna|Sharda Kumar|Pawan Mahendru|Vaibhav Mathur|Ram Menon|Krishna Narayan|Sharat Nyampalli|Gopal Pandit|Sachin Parikh|Nand Kishore Phadke|Priyam Pinbalkar|Jagdish Rajpurohit|Sunil Rege|Taruni Sachdev|Gautam Sethi|Jigna Shah|Kiran Shah|Atul Sharma|Satyajit Sharma|Zaver Shroff|Varun Shukla|Chiranjit Singh|Chandrakant Taneja|Yogesh Tripathi|Sharad Vyas|Olivier Lafont
title: Paa
